title: Ripley's Fun Facts & Silly Stories: One Zany Day!
description: Get ready for Fun Facts & Silly Stories One Zany Day! This over-the-top sequel to 2014's Fun Facts and Silly Stories The Big One brings 133 full-color pages of Bizzare Breakfasts, Strange School Stuff, interactive activities, and hard-to-believe stories from all over the planet. Fun Facts and Silly Stories One Zany Day! will have kids turning pages all day long!
author: Ripley Entertainment Inc.
